short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension picks default football winners based on the current game spread

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically picks the odds favorite of football games for ESPN's Pigskin Pickem (straight), ESPN's College Pickem (straight), and Old Chicago's Beat the Leader contests.  It uses the current Las Vegas point spread in determining which team is the favorite.  Just browse to the picking page of the contest and click the football icon on the Chrome taskbar.  Don't forget to submit the picks after they have been made!
